PourMoi SkinCare Clarifying Polish

Brand: Pour Moi

Category: Facial Cleanser

Brand: Pour Moi

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Aqua/Water/EAU, Sucrose, Silica, Sucrose Laurate, Sucrose Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Chlorphenesin, Caramel, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Fructose, Glucose, Tuber Aestivum Extract, Tocopherol, Citric Acid
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
